{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

# データを削除する","
","cur.execute('DELETE FROM person WHERE id = 1')

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"personテーブルで任意のidの行のデータを削除する","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'TEST.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
cur = conn.cursor()

# 任意の値を入れる","
","target_id = 1","

","# データを削除する","
","cur.execute('DELETE FROM person WHERE id = ?', (target_id, ))

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}
